name: home boy
description:
A small game inspired by point and click games from my childhood. Interact with objects, do chores like picking up dirty clothes or washing the dishes. Wander around the apartment or just chill on the balcony. What will you do today?

  • Title theme by DESKPOP's @dorkus64!
  • Explore 4 lifelike rooms (+ a hallway)
  • At least 3 animations, maybe more
  • Featuring professional voice acting from me and my friends
  • Don't pet the dog too much he doesn't like that

Thank you for playing!

Follow me on twitter!!
